name: Spectral Escape (itch) (TacSpat)
description:
You and your friends go into a haunted mansion while trick or treating. Will you get out? Go through 10 mazes and see for yourself!

Game supports Gamepad

WASD,  ARROWKEYS, or DPAD to move

SPACEBAR or Gamepad(A,X) for Flashlight

See if you can unlock the True Ending by beating all levels on impossible mode!
